activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#2724
activity.text:
* https://care.coronasafe.in/user/add
There was a discrepancy in GENDER_CHOICES in frontend and backend. 
Now the frontend has been updated to same choices as it is saved in backend. That is "Other" has been changed to "Non-Binary".
